name: SUVARNA KARNATAKA INTEGRATED RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY

address: SKIRDS (R)  SUVARNA KARNATAKA INTEGRATED RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY (R)  NO 2  1ST FLOOR 6TH CROSS SOMESHWARAPURAM  TUMAKURU KARNATAKA STAET INDIA.
NEAR GANESH TEMPLE AUOTO STAND NAMMURA AHARA CONDIMENT

briefDescription: Suvarna Karnataka Integrated Rural Development Society more commonly known as SKIRDS is a NGO organization registered under the karnataka society registration act of 1960(No-108/1997-96) and Income Tax 1961(12A 80G) and registered FCR act of 1976/2010(No-094640071R/2004) constituted in 1997.SKIRDS journey begin with aim of supporting and organizing innovative services for rural and urban cities.The organization mission is to develop and promote innovative technologies to protect the environment for quality of life and good women.SKIRDS next logical step is to set up a permanent solutions for human health careSKIRDS mission is to reach the unreachable persons to the following Health,Education,Socio-economic Religions Cultural Development. SKIRDS
